an4.158:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an4.158:1.3: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
an4.158:2.1: “Yo hi koci, avuso, bhikkhu va bhikkhuni va cattaro dhamme attani samanupassati, nitthamettha gantabbam:
an4.158:2.5: Ragavepullattam, dosavepullattam, mohavepullattam, gambhiresu kho panassa thanathanesu pannacakkhu na kamati.
an4.158:2.6: Yo hi koci, avuso, bhikkhu va bhikkhuni va ime cattaro dhamme attani samanupassati, nitthamettha gantabbam:
an4.158:3.1: Yo hi koci, avuso, bhikkhu va bhikkhuni va cattaro dhamme attani samanupassati, nitthamettha gantabbam:
an4.158:3.5: Ragatanuttam, dosatanuttam, mohatanuttam, gambhiresu kho panassa thanathanesu pannacakkhu kamati.
an4.158:3.6: Yo hi koci, avuso, bhikkhu va bhikkhuni va ime cattaro dhamme attani samanupassati, nitthamettha gantabbam:
